derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: probably an alteration of French dame-jeanne 'Lady Jane', by association with demi- 'half-sized' and the given name John

means.word_mean: 1. large bottle with a short narrow neck; often has small handles at neck and is enclosed in wickerwork
